sentences.cn: 湿漉漉的士兵们慢腾腾地进了兵营。

sentences.en: Billy came to school in soiled , bedraggled hand - medowns.
sentences.cn: 比利上学穿的是肮脏破旧的衣服.
他看上去又疲惫，又邋遢。

sentences.en: His appearance, in short, presented an odd mixture of the bedraggled and the ferocious.
sentences.cn: 总之, 他那副样子既狼狈不堪又残暴凶狠.

sentences.en: She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.
sentences.cn: 她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。

sentences.en: The advantage with network true racing bike such by bedraggled.
sentences.cn: 网络跑车真正的便利就这样被荒废了.
这个乞丐全身脏兮兮的衣服.

sentences.en: The geraniums in the flower bed looked bedraggled from the heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 花坛里的天竺葵被大雨浇得七零八落。

sentences.en: The others were a soaked, bedraggled , and uncomfortable lot.
sentences.cn: 其他人都浑身淋湿, 拖泥带水, 感到好不难受.

sentences.en: The tents looked very bedraggled after the storm.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨过后帐篷又湿又脏.

sentences.en: You look like a bedraggled chicken!

trans.tran_cn: 被弄得湿淋淋的，在烂泥中拖脏的，乱的，破旧的
trans.tran_en: Someone or something that is bedraggled looks messy because they have got wet or dirty

trans.tran_cn: 弄脏，弄湿，弄皱( bedraggle的过去式和过去分词 )
